channel.title: CVE Feed for WordPress -- WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WordPress -- WordPress

item.title: CVE-2022-3590|2024-08-03T01:14:02.086Z -- wordpress -- wordpress
item.description: WordPress is affected by an unauthenticated blind SSRF in the pingback feature. Because of a TOCTOU race condition between the validation checks and the HTTP request, attackers can reach internal hosts that are explicitly forbidden.
